Class HuffmanCompress

java.lang.Object
HuffmanCompress
public class HuffmanCompress
extends java.lang.Object
Responsible for handling all operations related to Huffman Compression

      Parameters:

      private static TreeNode buildTree​(int[] frequencyList)
      Used to construct the Tree for the Huffman Encoding
      Parameters:
      frequencyList - frequencyList to use when constructing the Tree
      Returns:
      returns the Constructed Tree

    • setBinaryValueList

      public static java.util.ArrayList<Node> setBinaryValueList​(TreeNode rootNode)
      Used to initiate the assignment of characters with their binary value
      Parameters:
      rootNode - root TreeNode of the Tree
      Returns:
      array containing characters and their binary value

    • genBinaryValueList

      private static void genBinaryValueList​(TreeNode rootNode, java.lang.String code, java.util.ArrayList<Node> binaryValueList)
      Assigns binary values of each character using recursion. Child Nodes of rootNode are called until reaching a Leaf Node (binary values 0/1 also being added in the process), where character and final binary value is added to binaryValueList
      Parameters:
      rootNode - current rootNode
      code - accumulated binary code
      binaryValueList - binaryValueList to store in

    • genEncodedString

      public static java.lang.String genEncodedString​(java.lang.String textContent, java.util.ArrayList<Node> binaryValueList)
      Combines binary values of characters in the order of initial text Content
      Parameters:
      textContent - content of the file to refer to
      binaryValueList - binaryValueList to refer to
      Returns:
      generated encodedString

    • storeBinaryValueList

      public static void storeBinaryValueList​(TextFile compressedFile)
      Used to store the BinaryValueList in compressedFile + _list.txt path. BinaryValueList is stored to be available for decompressing
      Parameters:
      compressedFile - compressed file to refer to

    • getCustomPath

      public static java.lang.String getCustomPath​(TextFile compressedFile, java.lang.String customString)
      Used to get a custom path for given TextFile
      Parameters:
      compressedFile - TextFile to get the custom path of
      Returns:
      built custom path

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Used as a UI when compressing
      Parameters:
      args - command line user input
